description: The notification will be generated when a deployment of Network Function component fails.

event.Summary: Network function $v2 component deployment failed due to $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFcDeploymentFailure APOCAO-MIB::apOCAOSourceServerAddress s EXAMPLE APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFName s EXAMPLE APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFcGroupName s EXAMPLE APOCAO-MIB::apOCAODUName s EXAMPLE APOCAO-MIB::apOCAOFailureReason s EXAMPLE

description: The address of the Oracle Communication Application Orchestrator (OCAO)
variables.name: APOCAO-MIB::apOCAOSourceServerAddress

description: The name of the Network Function
variables.name: APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFName

description: The name of the Network Function component group
variables.name: APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFcGroupName

description: The name of the Deployment Unit
variables.name: APOCAO-MIB::apOCAODUName

description: The reason for failure.
variables.name: APOCAO-MIB::apOCAOFailureReason

description: The notification will be generated to clear a prior apOCAONFcDeploymentFailure notification.

event.Summary: Network function $v2 component deployment failure resolved

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFcDeploymentFailureClear APOCAO-MIB::apOCAOSourceServerAddress s EXAMPLE APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFName s EXAMPLE APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFcGroupName s EXAMPLE APOCAO-MIB::apOCAODUName s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the Network Function component group
variables.name: APOCAO-MIB::apOCAONFcGroupName

description: The name of the Deployment Unit
variables.name: APOCAO-MIB::apOCAODUName

description: The notification will be generated when scale out operation fails due to lack of a available Deployment Unit for the Network Function component group.

event.Summary: Scale-out operation failed due to unavailable deployment unit
